data.expected_result: You still have the link/or have it copied ready to share
data.short_description: Creating a Intant Invite in a channel with only "Read Permission"  makes the invite link get lost
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with "Read Only" permission like mostly "Rules" channels are - While being in that channel open the drawer and tap the "Create Intant Invite" - Tap the link or the share link button
